name: Zeus + Poseidon
description: Requires GOG installer v2 or above.

files.setup: N/A:Select the Windows installer downloaded from GOG

content:
files:
- setup: N/A:Select the Windows installer downloaded from GOG
- wide: https://web.archive.org/web/20190909101400/https://www.wsgfmedia.com/jackfuste/Zeus/Zeus.7z
- save1:
    filename: Zeus.inf
    url: https://drive.google.com/uc?export=download&id=0B_fe1fNijaueMGZYNTdybEhxUDg
- save2:
    filename: Zeusmap.inf
    url: https://drive.google.com/uc?export=download&id=0B_fe1fNijaueMFNJSFZOUFFkWjA
game:
  exe: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Zeus and Poseidon/Zeus.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    args: /silent /nogui /suppressmsgboxes /dir="C:\GOG Games\Zeus and Poseidon"
    executable: $setup
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE
    file: $wide
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Zeus and Poseidon
    src: $save1
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Zeus and Poseidon
    src: $save2
- input_menu:
    description: 'Choose the desired resolution:'
    id: RESOLUTION
    options:
    - 1280x720: 1280x720
    - 1280x800: 1280x800
    - 1280x1024: 1280x1024
    - 1360x768: 1360x768
    - 1440x900: 1440x900
    - 1600x900: 1600x900
    - 1680x1050: 1680x1050
    - 1920x1080: 1920x1080
    - 1920x1200: 1920x1200
    - 2048x1152: 2048x1152
    - 2560x1440: 2560x1440
    - 2560x1600: 2560x1600
    preselect: 1920x1080
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Zeus and Poseidon
    src: $CACHE/$INPUT_RESOLUTION
